amendatorysection.catchline: Environmental audit; use as evidence; waiver.
amendatorysection.para: Except as provided in section 25-21,259, the person for whom the environmental audit was prepared, whether the audit was prepared by the person, by an employee of the person, or by a consultant hired by the person, may waive the protection provided in section 25-21,256 only by an express waiver.

crossreference.para: Applicability to Residential Lead-Based Paint Professions Practice Act, see section 71-6331.01.
